member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider
member.summary: Looks up files using embedded resources in the specified assembly. This file provider is case sensitive.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and empty base namespace.
member.param: The assembly that contains the embedded resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified assembly and base namespace.
member.param: The assembly that contains the embedded resources.
The base namespace that contains the embedded resources.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.GetFileInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Locates a file at the given path.
member.param: The path that identifies the file.
member.returns: The file information. Caller must check Exists property. A if the file could not be found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.EmbeddedFileProvider.GetDirectoryContents(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerate a directory at the given path, if any. This file provider uses a flat directory structure. Everything under the base namespace is considered to be one directory.
member.param: The path that identifies the directory
member.returns: Contents of the directory. Caller must check Exists property. A if no resources were found that match

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Embedded.EmbeddedResourceFileInfo
member.summary: Represents a file embedded in an assembly.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Embedded.EmbeddedResourceFileInfo.#ctor(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String,System.String,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of for an assembly using as the base
member.param: The assembly that contains the embedded resource
The path to the embedded resource
An arbitrary name for this instance

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Embedded.EmbeddedResourceFileInfo.Length
member.summary: The length, in bytes, of the embedded resource

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.Embedded.EmbeddedResourceFileInfo.LastModified
member.summary: The time, in UTC, when the was created
